2 ^ Deus in adjutórium meum intènde~; Dò: 5 ^ Exsùltent et laĕtèntur in te òmnes qụi qụaĕrunt te
qụi díliģunt salutáre tuum. ^ Let all that seek thee rejoice and be glad in thee
column7:
those who love thy salvation.
6 ^ Ego vero eģénus et paŭper sum~; Deus, ádjuva me. Adjútor meus et liberátor meus es tu~; Dòmine, ne moréris. ^ But I am needy and poor~; O God, help me. Thou art my helper and my deliverer~; O Lord, make no delay.
